scripts.format: cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet format && dotnet csharpier format . && dotnet format analyzers --severity warn && cd ../SeventySix.Client && npx eslint "src/**/*.ts" --fix && npx dprint fmt && npx eslint "src/**/*.ts" --fix
scripts.test: npm run test:server && npm run test:client
scripts.test:server: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" && cd SeventySix.Server && dotnet build && dotnet test
scripts.start: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" && cd SeventySix.Server && docker compose --env-file ../.env up -d --build --force-recreate && cd ../SeventySix.Client && npm start
scripts.start:api-debug: powershell -Command "if (-not (Get-Process 'Docker Desktop' -ErrorAction SilentlyContinue)) { Start-Process 'C:\Program Files\Docker\Docker\Docker Desktop.exe'; Start-Sleep -Seconds 10 }" && cd SeventySix.Server && docker compose --env-file ../.env up -d postgres jaeger prometheus grafana --no-deps && cd ../SeventySix.Client && npm start
